footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Build: Lyney | Update Date: 09/27/2023 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__The First Great Magic__
His Signature Weapon.
__Aqua Simulacra__
A general statstick.
__Scion of the Blazing Sun__ and __The Viridescent Hunt__
Battle Pass weapons, but also great statsticks.
__Prototype Crescent__
Best Craftable option, especially if you can get headshots with his Charged Shots, fares much better than __Song of Stillness__ or __Hamayumi__.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Polar Star, Skyward Harp, Thundering Pulse, Amos' Bow, Blackcliff Warbow, Slingshot, Sharpshooter's Oath

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK%|<goblet> Pyro DMG Bonus%|<circlet> CRIT DMG

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value:
CRIT DMG|Energy Recharge|CRIT Rate
(unlike most characters, Lyney naturally gains quite a lot of CRIT Rate, especially with Marechaussee Hunter)

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Normal Attack: Card Force Translocation
**2)** Elemental Burst: Wondrous Trick: Miracle Parade
**3)** Elemental Skill: Bewildering Lights

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Level your Elemental Skill over Elemental Burst if you do not have enough Energy Recharge to use it off cooldown. However with 2 other Pyro Characters or at least Bennett it should be fine.
